metadata.title: CVE-2023-52532 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:mana: Fix TX CQE error handling For an unknown TX CQE error type (probablyfrom a newer hardware), still free the SKB, update the queue tail, etc.,otherwise the accounting will be wrong. Also, TX errors can be triggered byinjecting corrupted packets, so replace the WARN_ONCE to ratelimited errorlogging.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
